FuncDef:
The sflow collector command creates an sFlow collector or displays the sFlow collector view.
The undo sflow collector command deletes an sFlow collector and all its configurations.
By default, sFlow collector view is not created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an sFlow collector.
The value is an enumerated type, which can be 1 or 2.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
An sFlow collector receives and analyzes sFlow packets. To create an sFlow collector or enter the sFlow collector view, run the sflow collector command.
